name: KunaiWay
description:
Hi I Made My Second Game Kunai Way , its a 2d PixelArt Platformer, where u fight Foes and Enemies . I hope u Like it ,give some FeedBack what u like and what is wrong.

Keys:

A move left

D move right

RMB aim

LMB throw

Backspace Change Weapon

Space Jump

C Crouch

X Dash

Have Fun! :D
